data.title: Pierre Raffarin RAID Virtual 2024 speech
data.meta_description: ‚ÄúWe have the opportunity to give a new dynamic to multilateralism with AI. We need to have this annual conference of regulators,‚Äù said Jean-Pierre Raffarin‚Ä¶
data.text:
In our #RAID2024 panel discussion on "International Alignment on Technology Regulation," we'll explore global benchmarks, how to balance trade and privacy, ensure tech neutrality, and foster competition in our multipolar world, taking lessons from various jurisdictions. Don't miss it! Register to join us and confirmed speakers Wassim Jouini of LegalPlace, Waldemar Gon√ßalves of Autoridade Nacional de Prote√ß√£o de Dados (National Data Protection Authority, Brazil) and Irakli Khodeli of UNESCO. üîó https://www.raid.tech/ üìÖ 23-24 September üìç Brussels #TechRegulation #GlobalStandards #TradeAgreements #PrivacyProtection #Innovation

üí≠ How should tech regulation and implementation balance the risks and opportunities of AI adoption and digital transformation? Join us for an insightful panel discussion on "Grasping the Opportunities and Threats of AI and Digital Transformation," where we'll explore government focus areas, tech regulation, industry innovation, equitable AI adoption, and intellectual property rights in generative AI! Find out more and register to join us and confirmed speakers Werner Stengg, Jon Donenberg and Karine Caunes ‚û°Ô∏è https://www.raid.tech/ #RAID2024 #AI #DigitalTransformation #Innovation #TechRegulation #intellectualproperty

We are honoured to announce that Didier Reynders, Commissioner for Justice, European Commission gives the keynote address at RAID 2024 in Brussels on 23-24 September. Register here: https://lnkd.in/djH3xJCs He heads up an outstanding roster of speakers from governments and regulators from all over the world, under the theme of Innovate, Regulate and Collaborate with Courage and Caution. We thank Commissioner Reynders and his team for their perennial support of RAID. #RAID2024 #techregulation #airegulation #aigovernance #justice #dataregulation #privacyprotection #bigtech #techgovernance #regulatoryaffairs #aiact #dma #dsa #europeancommissioner

It is a real privilege to welcome Anna Christmann to RAID 2024 as one of our esteemed speakers addressing How Governments can Support the Tech Sector. As a member of the #Bundestag, Federal Government Coordinator for Aerospace and #BMWK representative for the digital economy and start-ups, Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Climate Action of Germany we look forward to her insights on competition, innovation and technology! Register on https://lnkd.in/edj9Ap3q to take part üí° #RAID2024 #technology #startups #innovation

‚ÄúIs the way we interpret the GDPR‚Äôs inherent concepts adaptable to our digital reality?‚Äù, asked Natascha Gerlach CIPP/E, Director of Privacy Policy, The Centre for Information Policy Leadership (CIPL) at RAID Virtual. Similar questions are facing policymakers globally as data protection law is required to regulate a rapidly evolving digital landscape. The expert panel, 'Rethinking Data Protection', examined these challenges with a specific focus on policy in the EU, the UK and the US. Gerlach was joined by: - Katherine Harman-Stokes, Acting Director, Office of Privacy and Civil Liberties, U.S. Department of Justice - Tine A. Larsen, President, National Commission for Data Protection (CNPD) ‚Äì Luxembourg - Cecilia Alvarez, Director of Privacy Policy Engagement, EMEA, Meta - Isabel Simpson, Solicitor, KPMG UK (EMA Head of Data, Digital and Technology for KPMG Law) Read this write-up for some of the key insights from the discussion.

We are delighted that Cecilia Alvarez, Director of Privacy Policy Engagement, EMEA at Meta Regaining Trust in Government and Technology returns to #RAID2024 as a speaker - this time contributing to a panel discussion on Regaining Trust in Government and Technology. Find out more and register to join us ‚û°Ô∏è https://www.raid.tech/ #technology #dataprivacy #privacypolicy #trust

AI and Digital Transformation. Data Governance and Privacy. Competition vs. Competitiveness. Innovation and Technology. Tech Legislation. These are just some of the topics that our esteemed speakers will address during #RAID2024 in Brussels. More speakers are confirming their attendance every week, including Anu Talus, Nathaniel Moran, Dragos Tudorache, Leonardo Cervera-Navas, Astrid Cousin and Sergey Lagodinsky. Join us on 23-24 September to take part in important discussions on tech legislation, policy and regulation. üéô View the latest speaker line-up: https://lnkd.in/euCEVUzE üìù Take a look at the agenda: https://lnkd.in/eYKMqbiN ‚úÖ REGISTER: https://lnkd.in/edj9Ap3q #ai #digitaltransformation #governance #dataprivacy #competition #innovation #datagovernance #technology

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a federated universe which makes it sound huge and expansive and kind of endless, but the purpose of it is to find your community‚Äù, Palak Sheth, Head of Privacy Policy, Instagram and Threads, Meta said chairing opening a panel on the fediverse earlier this month. The panel was brought together by Privacy Laws & Business and convened by Stewart Dresner as discussions around the way the fediverse could reshape social media continue to gain momentum. Read this article for key insights from this expert discussion. #Fediverse #SocialMedia #Decentralisation #TechPolicy

As AI innovation continues to have a transformative impact across a wide range of sectors, an expert panel convened at RAID's April conference to discuss the balance between facilitating opportunity and managing risk in AI policymaking. For key insights from their panel discussion, read more here. #RAID2024 #AIRegulation #TechPolicy #EUAIAct #ExpertPanel
